org.jasig.cas

Interface CipherExecutor<T,R>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCipherExecutor, BaseStringCipherExecutor, BinaryCipherExecutor, NoOpCipherExecutor, ShiroCipherExecutor, TGCCipherExecutor, WebflowCipherExecutor

    public interface CipherExecutor<T,R>
    Responsible to define operation that deal with encryption, signing and verification of a value.
    Since:
    4.1

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R decode(T value)
      Decode the value.
      R encode(T value)
      Encrypt the value.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        R encode(@NotNull
       T value)
        Encrypt the value. Implementations may choose to also sign the final value.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the encrypted value or null

      • decode

        R decode(@NotNull
       T value)
        Decode the value. Signatures may also be verified.
        Parameters:
        value - encrypted value
        Returns:
        the decoded value.
